snippet: After a fall, life is upended in an instant — a sudden loss of independence, an awkward reliance on family and friends, and a new level of fear for those who fall, and their contemporaries.
abstract: Growing number of older Americans suffer serious injuries from falls, with more than 2.4 million over age of 65 treated in emergency departments for fall-related injuries in 2012; such injuries can often lead to long recovery times, loss of mobility and independence or even death.
lead_paragraph: After a fall, life is upended in an instant — a sudden loss of independence, an awkward reliance on family and friends, and a new level of fear for those who fall, and their contemporaries.
